data.actual_result: “User is typing” bar appears while channel loads
data.expected_result: “User is typing” bar doesn’t appear while channel loads
data.short_description: “User is typing” bar is visible during channel loading animation
data.steps_to_repro: - Fully close and reopen Discord to ensure channels are not loaded - Have a user type continuously in a channel that hasn’t loaded and switch to the channel - Observe the bottom of the message area where the “User is typing” bar appears
